as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子元素传递的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。

type.description: Control the sensitivity of the toast for accessibility purposes. For toasts that are the result of a user action, choose foreground. Toasts generated from background tasks should use background.
type.description_zh: 出于辅助功能目的，控制 Toast 的灵敏度。对于作为用户操作结果的 Toast，请选择 foreground。从后台任务生成的 Toast 应使用后台。

:duration.description: The time in milliseconds that should elapse before automatically closing the toast This will override the value supplied to the provider.
:duration.description_zh: 自动关闭 Toast 之前应经过的时间（以毫秒为单位） 这将覆盖提供给提供程序的值。

defaultOpen.description: The open state of the dialog when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its open state.
defaultOpen.description_zh: 最初呈现对话框时对话框的打开状态。在不需要控制其打开状态时使用。

:v-model:open.description: The controlled open state of the dialog. Must be used in conjunction with onOpenChange.
:v-model:open.description_zh: 对话框的受控打开状态。必须与 onOpenChange 结合使用。

forceMount.description: Used to force mounting when more control is needed. Useful when controlling animation with Vue animation libraries.
forceMount.description_zh: 用于在需要更多控制时强制安装。在使用 Vue 动画库控制动画时很有用。
